title: This new pick or ban Tristana meta is somehow even worse than the pick or ban Caitlyn meta.
body: Trist may not be as oppressive in lane on the surface but her all in is a lot better, she snowballs a lot harder, and ganking a Tristana lane is basically impossible. She also scales way harder than Caitlyn so a Tristana that gets rolling is basically unstoppable and your only real option is to 1 shot her; lord knows you can't stick to her for more than a moment with her resettable jump and disengage ult.

replies.body:
I really only ban Tristana when I'm playing Jhin, otherwise I ban MF, Twitch, Draven, etc.

I'm Bronze 2 and you don't see Tristana as often though.
I'm sure you see alot more interesting stuff.

I may be wrong, but you're not ADC if you go full AP.

Maybe she was planning to buy some AD on the last item?
Or she was carrying their AD.

I think he means Taliyah was going to the position which was meant to be occupied by an ADC, and only by an ADC. That's why this position is informally called "ADC". it is a side effect of marksman being the only viable position to fit into this role, save for rare picks like Ziggs or Mordekaiser.
Yes I know I was jesting.
so are we literally complaining about tristana because caitlyn got nerfed?

I'm personally complaining about Tristana because I hate her. The second half of season 4 was made absolute cancer by her presence and I hate that she's back again. The only adc I hate being meta more than Tristana is Kalista because fuck Kalista.

we will complain till adc isnt fundamentally broken. Aka when not 90% of their dmg - some casters like Ez/Luc is UNDODGEABLE AUTOATTACKS.

This is how the Meta Locust work.
Once they have depleted one field and left it a barren wasteland of nerfs they move onto the next
lmao this is so true yet so funny made me almost choke on my water

one ADC gets nerfed (caitlyn) , we cant throw salt at her anymore, time to move on to the next one (Tristana)

Once trist gets nerfed (following the pattern of complaints to nerf formula) jinx should be next on the menu. 

After that, we will be left with only short ranged ADCs. the dream is almost realized, people. lets get to it.

on the plus side, the amount of yasuo posts has dropped to a record low. 

ive been known to post salty, useless threads as well, so i feel like i fit right in here.

ew then all thats left is {{champion:236}} and {{champion:67}} no one should have to deal with vayne being meta for too long 
http://media.steampowered.com/steamcommunity/public/images/avatars/43/43d403ca3eaf1f2aa87c4286972c2276c1ffb13c_full.jpg

Let me point out something interesting. Trist actually has a lower winrate than Cait @ 45 min+ in plat+ games. My guess is that this has to do with the fact that she builds {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3094}} , which is really midgame centric. She isn't even amazing with Censer, as she doesn't synergize all that well with Runaans unlike the hyperscaling Kog and Twitch. 

In game 2 of the SKT vs. SSG series, a 6 item Tristana (ruler) wasn't even able to put meaningful damage on the Top lane Maokai (I saw a 232 crit, which isn't much really against a 3k+ HP tank). So I don't think Trist scales as hard as she used to. It's all about Kog and Twitch late game now.
Can you link me that video? I want to see that as well.

Here's the VOD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DLTx4yBYqaw

At 44:00 (time in Vid, not game) you can see Trist hitting Maokai with {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3156}} 

Then, starting about 55:00, Trist has {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3139}} and is mostly hitting frontline but really can't do anything.

Ah I see a new Complaint of the Month has arisen. 

Geez people you think that after a couple of years you guys would realize that when you nerf the top ADC, people are just gonna start shitting on you with the next best one.
I'm also getting sick of all the Thresh in the bot lane. q.q

Here's the difference between Trist and Cait and the main reason why Cait is a healthier champ, nothing interrupts Trist's W, everything interrupts Caitlyn's E. 

You can actually play around Cait's E. Trist can buffer her W to essentially be a QSS that works on displaces. This is a strength that's completely inappropriate for a hypercarry like Trist, it's OK on Ezreal because when he slips away he doesn't melt your team.

You what? I hit a Trist out of midair with Rhaast W the other day, I hit a Trist out of midair with Ahri E more than once, shit I SLOWED a Trist in midair with Zed's E once, she died from that combo as well.
Dont forgot a well timed Thresh E to fuck her W.
{{champion:40}}
Ahri E doesn't stop Trist W anymore. She will complete the animation.
This is dependent on Tristanas skill. If she is good she buffers her w to cast while she is getting cc'ed and thus ignores it. But if she is bad/average she messes up and the cc goes through.

This is because code-wise there's no 3rd dimension in Summoner's Rift.

Nothing interrupts her W? Are you smoking crack? You taking drugs? Please tell me you are atleast high making that statement. 

It's all about timing, you time it before her W starts going its never gonna work. You do it after shes in the air. She is fucked for life. That is how the displacements work on her. Think of Ezreals E with her W. However her W is so much easier to fuck up than Ezreal E.

I've managed to interrupt a trist w with my pillar as trundle. If trundle can do it I'm sure theres other champions who can.
You gotta get it right after she takes off. The jump won't be interrupted if you cc her during the windup.

I mean. the ad carry role is op. there is really no other way to say it. I've had Jinx's tank more damage than tanks because of how lifesteal works and ardent censor.
Crit itemization is too gold efficient when combined with ardent censer making the only weak point(only IE/ER) not even weak.
If it weren't for all the amazingly oppressive shielding supports, you could actually kill her, though.
Trist + Janna is a statcheck you can't even easily opt out of fighting. I hated the Lulu + Kog cheese, but even they couldn't insec you with impunity once they had a lead.
